name: Shaft
description:
Shaft is a single player/co-op game where you build a minecart track across an endless procedurally generated cave.

Mine stone and chop cactuses to create tracks, while also providing uranium to keep the minecart engine running.

Shaft is heavily influenced by the popular indie game called Unrailed!

Controller required for co-op!

Bitter Dream Games 

  • Matias Hilpinen, Artist 
  • Saku Pajari, Artist 
  • Timo Sissala, Programmer 
  • Kalle Saarinen, Programmer 
  • Eero Salmela, Programmer 
  • Ville Haavisto, Music
